wxl 1"845 - 2014 ckjdß 10 jeks isl=rdod - 2014'01'10
^rcfha n,hmsg m%isoaO lrk ,§&
II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 14
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
13 - B 80800 — 300 (2014/01)
D 1 -
    msgqj
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSu ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... ––
nQo,a kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
kS;s wOHdmk iNdfõ ±kaùï ... ... ... —

úúO ±kaùï ... ... ... ... 27
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h

i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g
wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk
whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka
wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk
úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2014 ckjdß ui 31 jeks Èk m<
lrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2014 ckjdß ui 17 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
 2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg hï
mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie,lsh hq;=h'˜
mS' tÉ' t,a' ù' o is,ajd"
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s ^je' n'&'
2014 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
ie' hq'- 2014'01'03 osk m< jQ wxl 1"844 ork .eiÜ m;%fha I : III fldgi m< fkdùh'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2014'01'1014
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - kqjrt<sh
kqjrt<sh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha jir 05lg jvd merKs kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍug iQodkï fldg we;s w;r" tu kvq wxl my;ska
olajd we;'
02' kvqj,g wod< hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K msgm;la fyda hï fldgila fyda kvqj,g
f.dkq lr we;s hï ,shú,a,la fyda wem uqo,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï" ta i|yd b,a,Sula 2014'04'10 Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha
frðiag%d¾jrhd fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
03' tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqjfyd;a my; i|yka ish¨u kvq jd¾;d 2014'04'10 jeks Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha § úkdY lrkq ,nk
nj fuhska oekqï fokq ,efí'
ta' ã' iS' tia' fyajdjiï"
ufyia;%d;a - kqjrt<sh'
2013 foieïn¾ ui 18 jeks Èk"
kqjrt<sh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha § h'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2014'01'10 27
úúO oekaùï
fíäka o is,ajd moku ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls
tï' fla' tka' ukQI kdkdhlaldr jk uu" Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha md¾,sfïka;=fõ ia:djr ksfhda.j, wxl 48 ork
ia:djr ksfhda.h hgf;a  “fíäka o is,ajd moku ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls˜ hkqfjka ye¢kafjk mk;a flgqïm;la md¾,sfïka;=fõ
§ bÈßm;a lsÍug woyia lrk nj fuhska oekqï foñ'
mk;a flgqïmf;a wruqK jkqfha my; i|yka fmdÿ mrud¾:j,ska hqla; jkakd jQ tlS fíäka o is,ajd moku ixia:d.; lsÍuhs (-
01' ixia:dfõ mrud¾: uqÿka m;a lr .ekSfuys ,d fh§ isák hï ks,Odßhl=g fyda fiajlhl=g YsIH;aj u.ska wdOdr ,nd §u iy
Y%S ,xldj ;=< iy bka msg; we;s fï yd iudk ix.ï iu. iyfhda.h wjfndaOh iy ñ;%;ajh m%j¾Okh lsÍu ;
02' cd;sh iy wd.u .ek fkd;ld ck;dj ;=< wfkHdkH wjfndaOh yd iyfhda.S;dj m%j¾Okh lsÍu ;
03' mßirh wdrlaId lsÍu" l<ukdlrKh lsÍu yd ixrlaIKh lsÍu i|yd jQ jHdmD;s wdrïN fldg mj;ajdf.k hdu ;
04' mqia;ld, msysgqjd mj;ajdf.k hdu iy fmd;am;a iÕrd" iure l,dm iy jdr ix.%y i|yd odhl ùu yd tajd ksl=;a lsÍu iy
by; mrud¾: uqÿka muqKqjd .ekSug wjYH wkqYx.sl fyda ys;lr fjk;a ish¨ oE lsÍu"
hkdÈh fõ'
ukQI kdkdhlaldr"
md¾,sfïka;= uka;%S"
.d,a, Èia;%slalh'
01-342
Y%S ,xld rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ uqøKh lrk ,§'
